about_the_game:
■ Overview

Give me Panty ministry’ is,

A very short gag comedy-novel game in which you play five rounds of rock-paper-scissors with a beautiful girl dressed as Father Christmas in the novel part.

The game is a very short gag-comedy novel game.

Players meet a beautiful Santa girl,

The story begins with an insane scene where a beautiful Santa girl asks for a pair of underpants.

If you win, you're in heaven; if you lose, you'll have to pay a painful price!

Can you win a game of rock-paper-scissors-scissors or will your wallet be destroyed?

Enjoy the light-hearted dialogue and the mini-game-like rock-paper-scissors part of the game.

■Game modes and functions

The game progresses around a conversation with a beautiful Santa girl who appears on Christmas night.

Includes many comical dialogues and gag effects.

Standing pictures and facial expressions change depending on the situation to entertain the player.

A total of five rock-paper-scissors challenges in the story.

Player operation is simple: just click to select ‘Goo’, ‘Choki’ or ‘Per’.

The story diverges depending on the winner and loser, thus adopting a multi-ending system.

A number of comical and light-hearted BGMs are included to liven up the tempo of the scenes.

The story unfolds rhythmically with a variety of sound effects and direction.

Play time.

A short storyline of approximately 5-10 minutes per round.

The scenario development changes depending on victory, defeat and branching, so it can be easily enjoyed even if played more than once.

Contents

Rock-paper-scissors game (5 rounds)

Easy to operate, just select (click) on the screen.

The storyline branches according to the result, and different endings and dialogues are provided.

BGM and sound effects

Several types of sound effects are included, mainly bright BGM to suit the scene.

They are used to enhance the production.

Multiple endings

Several patterns of endings exist, depending on the result of winning or losing a game of Janken.

You can enjoy a variety of endings, including happy endings and routes that end with painful expenses.

■Points

Easy to play with simple controls

The novel part can be read by clicking, while the rock-paper-scissors part only requires you to click on the choices.

You can play quickly because it is a short story.

The game has a multi-ending format, but the time required for each play is short,

You can easily collect multiple endings in your spare time.

Comical and comedy elements

The main plot revolves around the main character wanting ‘Santa's trousers’, which is an outlandish development.

Contains scenarios with light undertones and gag lines, with no explicit descriptions and an emphasis on interesting conversations and exchanges.

Translated with (free version)

※This is a short gag novel game revolving around a game of rock-paper-scissors with a beautiful Santa girl. Players aim to win five times in a row and experience a casual, multi-ending story while enjoying light-hearted conversation and numerous facial expressions. The comical development of the game is addictive, while the simple controls allow players to simply choose a rock-paper-scissors-scissors game. The game is full of comical background music and sound effects, and you can reach the ending in just a few minutes. The game also has a scenario branching depending on the winner of Janken, so you can enjoy the thrill of changing the ending.

content_descriptors.notes: This game will focus on panties. It is not sexually explicit, but please use caution when playing as it deals with underwear.
